This thick piece of leather decorated with purple threads makes an attractive necktie but also serves a functional purpose: protecting the neck from hits that you don't see coming. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against attacks while @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] from flanking.

Activateâ€”Stretch out Stock 1 (concentrate)

Frequency once per day

Effect The sturdy neck stock expands to cover not only your neck but also your shoulders and the back of your head. For 1 minute, you aren't off-guard to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden], undetected, or flanking creatures, or creatures using surprise attack of your level or lower.
